Class RelativeLocator

java.lang.Object
  org.jhotdraw.standard.AbstractLocator
      org.jhotdraw.standard.RelativeLocator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Locator, java.io.Serializable, Storable
public class RelativeLocator
extends AbstractLocator

A locator that specfies a point that is relative to the bounds of a figure.

<$CURRENT_VERSION$>
